thread.title: Paris Saint-Germain furious with "insulting" accusations regarding Marco Verratti and Blaise Matuidi
thread.title_full: Paris Saint-Germain furious with "insulting" accusations regarding Marco Verratti and Blaise Matuidi

author: Alex Richards
title: Paris Saint-Germain furious with "insulting" accusations regarding Marco Verratti and Blaise Matuidi
text:
The duo could barely believe their collapse at Camp Nou (Photo: REUTERS) Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Paris Saint-Germain are furious with reports Blaise Matuidi and Marco Verratti were in a nightclub on the eve of the French side's collapse against Barcelona. 
PSG have branded the "malevolent rumours" as "insulting", after suggestions in L'Equipe that the midfield duo were spotted by witnesses partying in a Paris nightclub until the early hours of Tuesday morning. 
Les Parisiens flew out to Barcelona on Tuesday, the eve of their 6-1 defeat to the Spanish champions at Camp Nou, which saw them dumped out of the Champions League despite holding a 4-0 lead from the first leg. 
The pair both played the full 90 minutes in Catalunya, as Los Cules scored three times in the final nine minutes to secure a dramatic victory - and a result that hasn't sat well in France. 
"Blaise Matuidi and Marco Verratti in a nightclub two days before Barcelona?" PSG posted on Twitter. 
"It is insulting to their professionalism and their club. A defeat will never authorise the spreading of the most malevolent rumours. 
"Shame to those - often L'Equipe - who disseminate them without even knowing their information. No credibility." Matuidi is booked early on during the defeat (Photo: REUTERS) Verratti sits alone after the defeat (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) 
PSG players were angrily confronted at the airport upon returning to Bourget Airport in the early hours of Thursday. 
The club said players were insulted and that some had their cars vandalised, amid angry confrontations that created what was described as an "extremely hostile and aggressive climate". Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
